definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
berserker (Norse warrior or fantasy role-playing character)

pinyin: zhen4 wang2 zhan4 shi4 ji4 nian4 ri4

sentences.english: The profile of the old warrior was characterized by a strong jaw and an aquiline nose.
sentences.chinese: 老戰士側面像的特徵是一個堅硬的下巴和一個鷹鉤鼻。

sentences.english: I am a Chinese armed police soldiers, I was on duty.
sentences.chinese: 緊急啊我是一名中國武警戰士，我正在值勤。

sentences.english: The soldiers were standing under the castle wall.
sentences.chinese: 戰士們站在城堡的牆腳下。

sentences.english: The enemy attacked in great numbers but our men stood their ground.
sentences.chinese: 敵人大舉進攻，但我方戰士仍堅守陣地。

sentences.english: Two soldiers dismounted the gun from the base.
sentences.chinese: 兩個戰士把炮從底座上卸下來。

sentences.english: He turns and scolds a group of local fighters lounging at a nearby roadblock.
sentences.chinese: 他轉過身，罵了在附近的路障閒逛當地戰士組。

sentences.english: All the soldiers must pin their armbands on.
sentences.chinese: 所有的戰士都必須佩戴袖章。

sentences.english: The soldier was as hard as nails.
sentences.chinese: 這位戰士身體如鐵打一般的強健。

sentences.english: He has grown into a warrior at one with nature's savagery.
sentences.chinese: 他已經成爲了擁有自然狂猛野性的戰士。

sentences.english: The soldiers used their bodies to plug up a hole in the dyke.
sentences.chinese: 戰士們用身體堵住大堤的裂口。

sentences.english: Volunteers were in the bush all the time and didn't let on.
sentences.chinese: 志願軍戰士們一直在灌木叢中，沒有暴露目標。

sentences.english: And those fighters seem to have been extremely dedicated.
sentences.chinese: 而這些戰士似乎就是要來獻身的。

sentences.english: Reflective warriors have a tragic sensibility.
sentences.chinese: 會反思的戰士有一種悲劇敏感性。

sentences.english: These soldiers are standing very straight.
He is a soldier who would die game.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個至死不屈的戰士。

definition: to sacrifice one's life/to sacrifice (sth valued)/beast slaughtered as a sacrifice
huge/great/grand/worthy of the greatest admiration/important (contribution etc)
Chiangchun township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
general/high-ranking military officer/to check or checkmate/fig. to embarrass/to challenge/to put sb on the spot
member of same class, team, work group etc/teammate
to attack/to accuse/to charge/an attack (terrorist or military)
